I enjoy my quiet life and green tea.

participant_2.background:
I once spent a week in a cabin in the mountains in the middle of winter and loved every minute of it.
I go for a walk with my dogs every day.
I'm a touring musician, but I also like gardening.
i have an above average iq.
I've had to give up some of my favorite foods to get healthy.

content.text: Hello, how is your day going?
Great, thanks for asking! How about yours?
Good! I am enjoying my quiet life and green tea.
That sounds relaxing. I am a touring musician but I also love gardening. I go for a walk with my dogs every day.
Wow, that sounds like a busy but fun life. How long have you been a touring musician?
For about 4 years now. It's a lot of fun but it can be exhausting. What do you do for work?
I've been at my job for 3 years and I love it! It's a lot of work but it's also very rewarding. I work in math and love it!
Oh cool! I've always been pretty good at math but I never really pursued it as a career. I'm happy you're enjoying it!
Thanks! I love it and I'm good at it so it's a good combination.
That's awesome! What's your favorite thing about your job?
I like the problem solving and working with numbers. I'm also really good at it and it's a lot of fun!
That sounds really great! I'm glad you're enjoying your job.
Thanks! I am. What's your favorite thing about your job?
I love the freedom I have. I can make my own schedule and travel all over the place. It's really fun and exciting!
That sounds really great! I'm glad you're enjoying your job.
Thanks! I am. I'm glad you're enjoying yours as well.
